subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The last stage of the battle for places in the new season's Champions League is all about money. And Tuesday's first-leg matches emphasized this financial imperative as Arsenal, Stuttgart and Olympiakos all won over less wealthy opponents.
snippet: The last stage of the battle for places in the new season's Champions League is all about money. And Tuesday's first-leg matches emphasized this financial imperative as Arsenal, Stuttgart and Olympiakos all won over less wealthy opponents.
